text: Thats terrible! Toon Boom have just taken 84% of their price for students if that helps? They must be running it at a price that they can afford to keep going.  I can't imagine how frustrating this is for you... but your uni will need to take this into account and let you some how finish... they should def have told you a plan by now...
You can get the cheapest toon boom for $6 a month which isn't bad.
Ask on your neighbour next door app if someone has a spare monitor laying around. You will be suprised! That might make it easier.
